channel.title: Gfx?
channel.description:
I'm making a command to make GFX start at a certain coordinate
i know the stillgfx(id, absY, absX); but thats based where you are
how do i make the GFX happen at like 5031Y, 7940X[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 27, 2009, 12:14:16 pm[/size][hr]if you could pm me the code becuase i have to go for a little while. :D

item.title: Gfx?
item.dc:creator: @stewie0888 stewie0888
item.description:
@stewie0888 wrote:

i want like.

say i type ::boom i want an explosion to happen at the coordinates in the command so i can be anywhre and type the command and the gfx will start

would it be like

stillgfx(ID, ####, ####);
??

Read full topic

item.title: Gfx?
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

Why don’t you just make like, a triggertele, and like make it like this…

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("emotetele")){ triggerTele(5031, 7940, 0); pEmote = 35; }

Read full topic
